quote: You've got all these people making action movies, and they've never been in a life-or-death situation.
Why did I spend all these years playing boring Europeans? I was made for action movies.
I was made for action movies.
I like the action business. I like the action movies. I guess Hollywood wants to see me do action. So I am down. I like it.

I've always wanted to do action and action movies. I grew up on that.

I'm a fan of action movies.
